title: Rahul Gandhi writes: Satyam Shivam Sundaram
selftext: To call Hinduism a set of cultural norms is to misunderstand it. To bind it to a geography is to limit it. Hinduism is how we understand our relationship with our fears.
cleaned_text: rahul gandhi writes satyam shivam sundaram call hinduism set cultural norms misunderstand bind geography limit hinduism understand relationship fears
